mapper.select: SELECT a.*, ap.*, s.site_id as site_name FROM (audit a INNER JOIN site s on a.site_id = s.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN audit_parameters ap ON a.id = ap.audit_id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND s.deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO audit (organization_id, site_id, operation, operation_timestamp, origin, primary_target_id, primary_target_type, primary_target_subtype, primary_target_value, actor_id, actor_details, cluster_node_id) VALUES (#{organizationId}, #{siteId}, #{operation}, IFNULL(#{operationTimestamp}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), #{origin}, #{primaryTargetId}, #{primaryTargetType}, #{primaryTargetSubtype}, #{primaryTargetValue}, #{actorId}, #{actorDetails}, #{clusterNodeId});

INSERT INTO audit_parameters (audit_id, target_id, target_type, target_subtype, target_value) VALUES
(#{auditId}, #{element.targetId}, #{element.targetType}, #{element.targetSubtype}, #{element.targetValue})
